stepAnswer: You bring more value when you don't simply understand what's happened, but you understand what will happen and can recommend conditions to improve on that.
stepTitle: Why is it a good idea to include predictive and prescriptive analytics in your work?
choices: Predicting the future is exciting and interesting to people.
You bring more value when you don't simply understand what's happened, but you understand what will happen and can recommend conditions to improve on that.
Understanding what has happened in the past is all you need to do.
The more work you do, the happier your boss will be.
